lanes.name: sandbox
lanes.description: Auto-accepted but not trusted; visible as contrib-autopilot/sandbox.

lanes.name: stable
lanes.description: Accepted set used by search; requires rules + signatures.

lanes.name: trusted
lanes.description: High trust: continuity + multi-source trust + time-based reputation.

lanes.name: archived
lanes.description: Frozen, historical snapshots for decade-grade reproducibility.
